title: Strong Gender Equality Efforts
description: In 2019, Moldova achieved a CPIA gender equality rating of 4.5, indicating significant progress towards gender equality.

title: Limited Shipping Connectivity
description: Moldova's liner shipping connectivity index was 0.635 in 2020, reflecting limited integration into global shipping networks.

title: Low Container Port Traffic
description: In 2019, Moldova handled 818 TEUs, indicating minimal container port activity compared to global standards.

title: Prolonged Import Lead Time
description: The median lead time to import goods into Moldova was 32 days in 2016, highlighting inefficiencies in import processes.

title: Minimal Unemployment Benefits Coverage
description: In 2017, only 0.027% of Moldova's richest quintile received unemployment benefits, suggesting limited social safety nets.

title: High Mortality from Unintentional Poisoning
description: Moldova reported a mortality rate of 4.15 per 100,000 due to unintentional poisoning in 2021, with males being more affected at 6.71 per 100,000.

title: Fair Income Distribution Among Lowest 10%
description: In 2022, the lowest 10% of Moldova's population held 4.5% of the income share, indicating a relatively equitable income distribution.

title: Low Female Employer Representation
description: As of 2023, only 7.97% of female employment in Moldova was in employer roles, highlighting gender disparities in leadership.

title: High Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, females constituted 54.72% of Moldova's labor force, showcasing strong female participation in the workforce.
